lines.text: the creature of Cagliostro and... the monster of Frankenstein. Cagliostro's magnetic power steals into their bodies. It is taking hold. Now they are about to procreate. Their procreation is perfection. They are fabulous creatures. They are divinities. Their most marvelous bodies will mate and remain united."
The time has arrived. The monster will begin his work. Enjoy it, Melisa. I want you to enjoy it most particularly.
